CustomField.formula: IF ((Product_Name__c) = "Social Media / Email Campaign - 12X" && TEXT(Times_Announced__c) = "12" || (Product_Name__c) = "Social Media / Email Campaign - 6X" && TEXT(Times_Announced__c) = "6" || (Product_Name__c) = "Social Media / Email Campaign - 4X" && TEXT(Times_Announced__c) = "4" || (Product_Name__c) = "Social Media / Email Campaign - 2X" && TEXT(Times_Announced__c) = "2", TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Announcement Completed
